summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Fletcher Street, from 50th Avenue South to 51st Avenue South; by constructing sewers and side sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9727 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
